metadata.description: These tokens were issued in an effort to save 120 hectares of the Amazon jungle from being turned into sand. Each token entitles the owner to a week-long Ayahuasca retreat generously provided by Yosi Ocha (https://yosiocha.com/). All the funds raised from the sale of these tokens is being used to buy up land in the Amazon jungle to prevent its destruction and preserve it for future generations of the Shipibo-Conibo people who live on the land and depend on its resources.
